title: Can Semiconductor Chips be Recycled?
summary: Semiconductor chips, vital components of electronics, pose environmental risks throughout their lifecycle. Recycling these chips is crucial for mitigating these risks, and innovative techniques like open-loop recycling and integrated circuit reuse are being developed. The industry is facing challenges in achieving circularity due to the complexity of semiconductor composition, but advancements in recycling technologies and eco-conscious consumer demand are driving progress towards sustainable practices.

title: JOHNSON CONTROLS HITACHI AIR CONDITIONING MALAYSIA SDN BHD CELEBRATES 35 YEARS OF BUILDING A LEGACY IN MALAYSIA
summary: Johnson Controls-Hitachi Air Conditioning Malaysia Sdn Bhd, the leading manufacturer of Hitachi air conditioners, recently celebrated its 35th anniversary in Malaysia. The company has continuously invested in new product development and technology upgrades, ensuring it is well-positioned to meet future industry needs. Johnson Controls-Hitachi Air Conditioning Malaysia Sdn Bhd is also dedicated to minimising its environmental impact and contributing to a sustainable future, with initiatives such as reducing reliance on fossil fuels and lowering emissions.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article describes the company's commitment to minimizing its environmental impact and contributing to a sustainable future, including initiatives such as a transition to environmentally friendly refrigerants, a goal of zero-landfill, and the installation of solar panels.
business_innovation: TRUE. The article describes the company's continuous development of new products and technology upgrades, as well as its investment in a full-fledged research and development centre and diagnosis centre for quality assurance.
green_product: TRUE. The article mentions that the company is actively pursuing several initiatives, including a transition to environmentally friendly refrigerants.
green_process: TRUE. The article mentions that the company has implemented robust recycling practices and wastewater management treatment systems, and is actively pursuing several initiatives, including a transition to environmentally friendly refrigerants.
